job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Our client is a global multi-strategy hedge fund looking to hire brilliant PhD quantitative researchers for its quantitative strategies trading team.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>The Role</strong></p><p><br></p><p>As a quant on the team, you will be working alongside experienced PhD quant traders, data analysts and seasoned software engineers.&nbsp; The environment is collegiate and collaborative.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>You will enjoy a full-lifecycle research role where you will apply your observation skills and research expertise to identify and build predictive models for trading the global financial markets.</p><p><br></p><p>You will be involved in researching both new systematic trading strategies and analyzing existing strategies to identify potential improvements.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Skills &amp; Experience:</strong></p><p><br></p><p>&gt;<strong> </strong>No Finance Industry experience is required.</p><p>&gt; PhD in Science, Math, Engineering or other quantitative field.</p><p>&gt; 0 - 4 years Post PhD experience from any Industry.</p><p>&gt; Research expertise in analysing and finding signals / patterns in high dimensional datasets.</p><p>&gt; Strong programming skills in Python or C++.</p><p>&gt; Ability to express ideas mathematically and algorithmically.</p><p>&gt; Willingness to seek guidance and learn new skills.</p><p>&gt; Intellectually curious, extraordinary mental flexibility and a high tolerance for ambiguity.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Please apply via this posting</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>**Please Note: We are a niche recruitment firm specializing in the quantitative trading and Fintech Industry. We have been retained by our client to identify, interview and introduce suitable candidates for this position**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p>
